Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Enacts Killian's law
Summary: Enacts "Killian's law"; establishes a timely repair for wheelchair program; extends the warranty period for wheelchairs to 2 years; deems all wheelchair repairs needed within 5 years of initial prescription medically necessary.
LawCode: Ren Art 32 §670 to be Art 32-A §676, add §§677 & 678, amd §676, Gen Bus L; add §367-j, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the social services law, in relation to enacting "Killian's law"
